summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley sent on New Year's Day 2011, indicating he is in Brazil with three women. The email is marked as confidential and is associated with JPMorgan Chase.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley sends a personal email mentioning his location and company affiliation.

events.title: New Year Celebration
events.description: Jes Staley sends an email celebrating the New Year while in Brazil.

keyFacts: The email was sent by Jes Staley.
Staley mentions being in Brazil with three women.
The email is marked as confidential by JPMorgan Chase.
